function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling and processing of contaminated wastewater samples may pose a risk of exposure to infectious viral RNA.","Impact":"Potential transmission and infection of personnel and community members if proper precautions are not taken.","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment (PPE), implementation of strict laboratory protocols, and adherence to biosecurity measures.","Technologies":"Use of biosafety cabinets, autoclaves, and other laboratory equipment designed for handling infectious substances.","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and community members in close proximity to the laboratory.","Owner":"Laboratory management and research institution."}]}
